title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 173.2 - Records to be maintained
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 173.2 - Records to be maintained

State Regulations

Unless otherwise agreed to in writing the licensee shall
deliver to the client a written report, setting forth the services performed on
the client's behalf. This report shall be presented to the client at the time
of billing and shall be maintained by the licensee for a period of three years
after completion of the service, unless there is litigation pending which would
require the records to be maintained until the litigation is
completed. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
173.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
